unauthorised: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à accéder à cette ressource
mobile-money-prompt: Pour accéder a votre compte mobile money, appuyez sur {index}.
bill-prompt: Pour payer une facture, appuyez sur {index}.
account-prompt: Pour mettre à jour votre compte, appuyez sur {index}.
not-implemented: Désolé, ce service n'a pas encore été mis en œuvre. Je vous ramène au menu principal pour que vous puissiez faire un autre choix.
welcome-stranger: Bonjour. Il semble que vous n'avez pas de message enregistré.
welcome-known: Bonjour et bienvenue sur notre système de démonstration biométrique.
welcome: Hello again. Welcome to the Biometrics for All
verification-request: Pour accéder à votre compte, veuillez répéter la phrase suivante:
verification-confirmation: Génial! Votre phrase secrète a été validée avec {confidence}% de confiance.
verification-failed: Nous n'avons pas pu vérifier votre voix. Veuillez réessayer.
verification-error: Sorry, you have reached the limit of attempts
enrol-welcome: Hello. It looks like you don't have an account. In way to proceed with your registration you must record your voice.
enrol-confirmation: Génial. Pour terminer votre inscription, nous avons besoin {remaining, plural, one {d'une inscription supplementaire} other {de # inscriptions supplémentaires}}
enrol-confidence-low: Sorry, the recording was not clear. Please try again.
enrol-no-phrase: There are no more available phrases to enrol with.
enrolment-complete: Merci. Votre voix est maintenant enregistrée.
reactivation-welcome: Hello. It looks like your number is deactivated. In way to proceed with your reactivation you must verify your voice.
mobile-money: To access your mobile money account, press {index}.
mobile-money-balance: To check your mobile money balance, press {index}.
passphrase-manager: To record new verification phrases, press {index}
bill-payment-number: The payment number you entered is {payment}
bill-payment-error: Sorry, the payment number you entered is not valid
bill-payment-value: The payment will cost you {paymentValue}, press 1 if you want to proceed or 2 to cancel the payment
bill-payment-invalid-value: Sorry, you do not have the required funds in your account to make this transaction.
transfer-message: Please insert the payee's account number
transfer-account-number: The account number you entered is {transfer-account}
transfer-account-error: Sorry, the account number you entered is not valid
transfer-account-value: Please enter the value you want to transfer
transfer-account-invalid-value: Sorry, you do not have the required funds in your account to make this transaction.
transfer-account-confirmation: You are transferring {transfer-value} to {tranfer-account}, press 1 if you want to proceed or 2 to cancel
passphrase-add: To add a new passphrase, press {index}
deactivate-account: Your account has been successfully deactivated. We hope to see you soon! Thank you.
validation: In way to verify your identity, please repeat the following phrase:
alert-welcome: Bonjour. Ceci est un appel de démonstration du projet Biometrics For All. Une activité suspecte a été signalée sur votre compte. Veuillez vérifier votre identité pour autoriser cette transaction.
alert-authorised: Merci d'avoir vérifié votre identité. La transaction a été autorisée.
alert-message: To simulate an Alert, please visit our web page and follow the instructions.
alert-unregistered: Ce numéro de téléphone n'est pas encore inscrit pour la vérification vocale.
survey-welcome: Thank you for evaluating the Biometrics For All. If you could please take our feedback survey, just wait, it won't take longer than one minute!
survey-question-01: How would you evaluate the voice verification process? Press a number from 1 to 5 where 1 means very poor and 5 means excellent
survey-question-02: Do you think the menu flow was easy to understand? Press a number from 1 to 5 where 1 means very poor and 5 means excellent
survey-finish: Thank you. Your answers have been recorded.
return-menu: To return to the main menu, press {index}
survey-option: To answer our short survey, press {index}
good-bye: Thank you for using Biometrics For All, Good bye!
unapproved-caller: Please contact the GSMA inclusive tech lab to authorize your telephone number before using this service.
